attributes.action: require Dunhill to re-launch their Edition range of products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dunhill Edition after-shave etc. are classic products, much-loved by discerning males (and females) throughout the world. It appears that Dunhill, in their infinite wisdom, have decided to withdraw these products from the market. This is a mistake that needs to be corrected without delay.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
